game

Class Teams

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Teams

  • public class Teams
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    vsh33 The Teams class holds all the heroes and the inventory of the team: items, power ups, money, maps, and cities left to clear.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Teams(java.lang.String teamName)
      Creates a team.

      • Teams

        public Teams(java.lang.String teamName)
        Creates a team. Initialises array lists for items to empty.
        Parameters:

      • getCombatHero

        public SuperHeroes getCombatHero()
        Gets the hero who is currently fighting. Combat hero is selected by the user when they battle the villain.
        Returns:
        SuperHeroes SuperHero - hero who was last fighting.

      • setCombatHero

        public void setCombatHero(SuperHeroes combatHero)
        Sets the combat hero.
        Parameters:
        combatHero - SuperHeroes - the hero chosen to fight the villain.

      • setClairvoyance

        public void setClairvoyance(boolean clairvoyance)
        Special ability which is set when Doctor Strange is added to the team. Enables the user to have access to maps all the time.
        Parameters:
        clairvoyance - boolean - sets clairvoyance to true or false.

      • isClairvoyance

        public boolean isClairvoyance()
        Special ability which gives access to the map at all times.
        Returns:
        boolean clairvoyance - whether the team is clairvoyant.

      • isCheaperPrices

        public boolean isCheaperPrices()
        Checks if the team has access to cheaper shop prices. Cheaper shop prices lower the cost of items.
        Returns:
        boolean cheaperPrices - whether the team has cheaper prices.

      • setCheaperPrices

        public void setCheaperPrices(boolean cheaperPrices)
        Sets whether the team has cheaper prices. Cheaper prices decreases the cost of items in the shop.
        Parameters:
        cheaperPrices - boolean - sets cheaperPrices to true or false.

      • getNumCities

        public int getNumCities()
        Gets the number of cities left for the team to complete. If numCities is 1, when the team beats the villain, the game is won.
        Returns:
        int numCities - number of cities left to clear.

      • setNumCities

        public void setNumCities(int numCities)
        Sets the number of cities.
        Parameters:
        numCities - int - number of cities the user wants to explore.

      • addHero

        public void addHero(SuperHeroes hero)
        Adds a new hero to the team. The team size is capped at 3. Teamsize variable is incremented.
        Parameters:
        hero - SuperHeroes - new hero to be added to team.

      • removeHero

        public void removeHero(SuperHeroes hero)
        Removes the specified hero from the team. Occurs when a hero dies in combat.
        Parameters:
        hero - SuperHeroes - hero to be removed.

      • addItem

        public void addItem(HealingItems item)
        Adds the specified healing item to the inventory. Occurs when a healing item is purchased or gifted.
        Parameters:
        item - HealingItems - item to be added.

      • addMap

        public void addMap(Maps map)
        Adds the specified map to the inventory. Occurs when a healing item is used or robbed.
        Parameters:
        map - Maps - item to be added.

      • removeItem

        public void removeItem(HealingItems item)
        Removes the specified healing item from the inventory. Occurs when a healing item is used or robbed.
        Parameters:
        item - HealingItems - item to be removed.

      • addPowerUp

        public void addPowerUp(PowerUps powerUp)
        Adds the specified powerup to the inventory. Occures when a powerup is purchased or gifted.
        Parameters:
        powerUp - PowerUps - powerup to be removed.

      • removePowerUp

        public void removePowerUp(PowerUps powerUp)
        Removes the specified powerup from the inventory. Occures when a powerup is used or robbed.
        Parameters:
        powerUp - PowerUps - powerup to be removed.

      • hasMap

        public boolean hasMap(java.lang.String cityName)
        Checks to see whether the team has the map of a specified city present. Used in the home base screen. If true, the map will be displayed. Clairvoyance being true will make this function always return true.
        Parameters:
        cityName - String - Mapslist is checked to see if a map of this city has been purchased.
        Returns:
        boolean mapPresent - true if the map is present in mapslist.

      • alterMoney

        public void alterMoney(int amount)
        Team money is altered by an amount.
        Parameters:
        amount - int - the value by which to change team's money.

      • containsHero

        public boolean containsHero(java.lang.String name)
        Team is checked to see whether the hero named is present.
        Parameters:
        name - String - of the hero to check for.
        Returns:
        boolean flag - whether the hero is present.

      • getItemInfo

        public java.lang.String getItemInfo()
        Gives a formatted html string displaying the contents of the team's inventory. Used so the user can see items they possess.
        Returns:
        String info - formatted html string of inventory contents.

      • getTeamInfo

        public java.lang.String getTeamInfo()
        Gives a formatted html string of info on the team. Includes heroes, items, and money.
        Returns:
        String info - formatted html string containing team information.
